BR_text.BRdescription:
Have seen this in a few PRs before. Now it's always failing in my PR.
 <denchmark-link:http://jenkins.mxnet-ci.amazon-ml.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/incubator-mxnet/detail/PR-11251/9/pipeline/749>http://jenkins.mxnet-ci.amazon-ml.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/incubator-mxnet/detail/PR-11251/9/pipeline/749</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-code>test_gluon_trainer.test_trainer_reset_kv ... 
 
 (py2) C:\jenkins_slave\workspace\ut-python-cpu>IF -1073741676 NEQ 0 exit /b 1 
 
 script returned exit code 1
 </denchmark-code>

comments_0.comment_text:
The same problem shows up in my very old branch (about one month old). So if there is a bug in the code, the bug exists a long time ago. If it's not a bug, it might be something in the Windows testing system (it only fails in Windows as far as I know).
 <denchmark-link:http://jenkins.mxnet-ci.amazon-ml.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/incubator-mxnet/detail/PR-10893/5/pipeline>http://jenkins.mxnet-ci.amazon-ml.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/incubator-mxnet/detail/PR-10893/5/pipeline</denchmark-link>

comments_2.comment_text: I'm able to reproduce it on windows. Still investigating
